rows.label: qev086305_MSG0001
rows.name:
Tora glad everyone return safe.
Could friends find the guardian etherscale?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0002
rows.name: We did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh-ho! Tora speechless![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0004
rows.name: Come! Let us ready that remedy for you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0005
rows.name: And here we go. It is finished...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0006
rows.name: Thank you, friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0007
rows.name: Tatsu glad to see all end well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0008
rows.name: Thanks to friends, Nopon future is secure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh and, Elma, this is for your team...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0010
rows.name: What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0011
rows.name: A special augment born of the remedy's creation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0012
rows.name: Really? What does it do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0013
rows.name: It shares the remedy's healing properties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0014
rows.name: How in the world...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0015
rows.name:
We'd like to think of it as a gift from the Ruler of Fates.
It's a pleasing thought, at any rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0016
rows.name: A gift...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0017
rows.name: Welcoming and accepting us all as inhabitants here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0019
rows.name: What is Tora waiting for? Go give medicine to sick Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0020
rows.name: Oh, right! Tora almost forget to drink it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0021
rows.name: WHAAAAAAAAT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0022
rows.name: What are you saying?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0023
rows.name: Tora said heir to Nopon future had terrible sickness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0024
rows.name: Yes, very terrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0025
rows.name:
Tora, heir to Nopon future,
have terrible gas after eating HUGE lunch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0026
rows.name:
At long last, Tora find relief.
Ancient Nopon remedy work wonders![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0027
rows.name: ...Hmm? Why are friends so quiet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0028
rows.name: Tora need more than medicine when Tatsu finished with him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0029
rows.name: Gah! Wh-what did Tora do?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0030
rows.name:
Tora will also look for ingredients for ancient
Nopon remedy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0031
rows.name:
Friends should go get aeviter star wings and
obsidian fragment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0032
rows.name: Please hurry! For sake of heir to Nopon future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0033
rows.name:
If friends can find guardian etherscale,
Tora promise to take care of rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0034
rows.name:
Tora will save heir to Nopon future,
even if it cost life of Tora![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086305_MSG0035
rows.name: So go to Noctilum and defeat Ruler of Fates![ST:wait ]
